user_query: Present evidence-based arguments supporting or refuting the claim that "10% of sudden infant death syndrome (SIDS) deaths happen in newborns aged less than 6 months."
Present evidence-based arguments supporting or refuting the claim that "7-day-old adult Caenorhabditis elegans exhibit approximately 5% of the learning capacity seen in 1-day old adults."
Outline fact-based assertions either supporting or opposing the assertion that "76-85% of people with severe mental disorder receive no treatment in low and middle income countries."
Provide factual statements for or against the statement that "90% of sudden infant death syndrome (SIDS) deaths happen in newborns aged less than 6 months."
Provide factual statements for or against the statement that "A breast cancer patient's capacity to metabolize tamoxifen influences treatment outcome."
Provide factual statements for or against the statement that "A high microerythrocyte count protects against severe anemia in homozygous alpha (+)- thalassemia trait subjects."
Present evidence-based arguments supporting or refuting the claim that "AMP-activated protein kinase (AMPK) activation increases inflammation-related fibrosis in the lungs."

Present a series of logical points to either validate or contest the statement that "APOE4 expression in iPSC-derived neurons increases AlphaBeta production and tau phosphorylation causing GABA neuron degeneration."
Present evidence-based arguments supporting or refuting the claim that "Adult tissue-resident macrophages are seeded before birth."
Present a series of logical points to either validate or contest the statement that "Adult tissue-resident macrophages stem from the embryonal yolk sac and fetal liver."
Build factual arguments to either support or refute the claim that "Aged patients are less susceptible to ischaemia/reperfusion injury."
Present evidence-based arguments supporting or refuting the claim that "Aged patients are more susceptible to ischaemia/reperfusion injury."
Present evidence-based arguments supporting or refuting the claim that "All hematopoietic stem cells segregate their chromosomes randomly."
Present evidence-based arguments supporting or refuting the claim that "Ambulatory blood pressure monitoring is inaccurate at diagnosing hypertension."
Provide factual statements for or against the statement that "Anthrax spores are very difficult to dispose once they are dispersed."
Provide factual statements for or against the statement that "Antibiotic induced alterations in the gut microbiome reduce resistance against Clostridium difficile"
Present a series of logical points to either validate or contest the statement that "Articles published in open access format are more likely to be cited than traditional journals."

Present a series of logical points to either validate or contest the statement that "Autologous transplantation of mesenchymal stem cells causes fewer opportunistic infections than induction therapy with anti-interleukin-2 receptor antibodies."

Present evidence-based arguments supporting or refuting the claim that "Autologous transplantation of mesenchymal stem cells has better graft function than induction therapy with anti-interleukin-2 receptor antibodies."
Present a series of logical points to either validate or contest the statement that "BCL-2 promotes the apoptotic effects of c-Myc."
